attributes.action: Award £10 to UK residents for each manual clock change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Us Brits have been changing our clocks back and forth for as long as we remember.

We should be rewarded for our trouble!

Please sign if you think that every UK citizen over 5 years of age should be awarded £10 for every clock that they have to manually change. 

(sorry, smokers excluded).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
